dict.acceptation: 允许，任由；让，随；假设；出租；

sent.orig: For high LET radiation, αDSBs are mainly induced by the LMDS mechanism.
sent.trans: 对高LET辐射， α DSB主要由LMDS机制产生。

sent.orig: She said her future husband would not let her make another film.
sent.trans: 她说她的未婚夫不会让她再拍电影了。（此句用would not let，意思是“阻止”）

sent.orig: The verb" let"is construed with an infinitive omitting the" to"
sent.trans: 动词let习惯上与不带to的动词不定式连用。
